info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Albany, southeastern Saratoga and western Rensselaer Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rensselaer, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roadways. Locations impacted include... Albany, Troy, East Greenbush, Cohoes, Watervliet, Rensselaer, Colonie, Latham, Delmar, Menands, Green Island, Grafton, Waterford, Loudonville, West Sand Lake, Center Brunswick, Wyantskill, Wynantskill, Halfmoon and North Greenbush. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 10 and 24. Interstate 87 between exits 23 and 7, and between exits 8A and 9. Interstate 787 between exits 1 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
